name: Rare Cantorell
description: The Rare Cantorell loves love! It takes its species's yearning for closeness to the next level, growing in tight-knit choirs that sap all nutrients from the soil and leave their bodies a fleshy pink hue. The Rare Magical's craving for cuddles has even caused its mycelium tendrils to grow upwards and outwards, reaching out to others in the choir for a comforting hug. Rare Cantorell choirs can even end up so intertwined that, when seen from above, their 'rings' in fact appear heart-shaped.
breedingTime: Breeding Time: 1 day 1 hr 30 min, Enhanced Time: 19 hr 7 min 30 sec
